Attacks.Name: Pound
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Cleffa gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Charm
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target suffers -1 attack die on its next attack.

Superpowers.Name: Magic Guard
Superpowers.Effect: Cleffa cannot take damage from special conditions.

Superpowers.Name: Sweet Kiss
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within Range 2. That character gains the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Fairy Wind
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target is pushed S.

Superpowers.Name: Moonlit Glow
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 2 damage from Cleffa or an allied character within Range 2.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Clefairy character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
